nodes.bodyText: Now, we have non linear shunt compensator, so it means that we also have to support that for the CGMES update. I wonder if the code is working for that kind of equipment.
I will have to review. Current export does not support NonLinearShuntCompensators.
I propose to add export support for that equipment in a separate, specific PR.
Yes, great. I am going to open an issue to keep that in mind and I am going to merge this PR as it is.
